name: validate_up_to1000
description: Enter an array of up to 1000 numbers to validate.

name: validate_up_to100
description: Enter an array of up to 100 numbers to validate.

name: validate_up_to10
description: Enter an array of up to 10 numbers to validate.

name: validate_single_whatsapp_number
description: Enter a single phone number you want to validate.

phone.description: The whatsapp number must be written as: number (including countrycode); do NOT include any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number. Examples: of correct numbers are: 34123456789 (for spain) or 491234567890 (for Germany). Default: 34605797764
phone.title: Phone

name: is_abusiness
description: Requests to this endpoint will return `true` if the number is a Whatsapp for Business account, or `false` if it's not.

phone.description: The whatsapp number must be written as: countrycode and number; do NOT include any non-number character, spaces, or anything which is not a number. Examples: of correct numbers are: 34123456789 (for spain) or 491234567890 (for Germany). Default: 34655719560
phone.title: Phone

name: about_info
description: This endpoint will return the *About* state of the WA number on the query.
